Comments_List: Practiced presenting on independent research and listened to others' presentations.

This course was a wonderful introduction to the real life of chemistry. Dr. Parr did a great job in teaching how working in a lab postgrad will be like, as well as setting us up with the appropriate steps to take in order to have a successful career in the chemistry field.

Strengths: supports independent research in the chemistry department, provides presentation practice
Weaknesses: high variability based on PI, research project; 490 seminar is not very structured
Major strength of this class is how relaxed it is. It made me feel very comfortable asking questions and learning along side the undergrads I spent my four years of chemistry with.
Have to take if performing independent research for the CHEM senior requirement. It is a good way to practice speaking and presenting your work.
